text: The Informer is a 1935 American crime drama movie directed by John Ford and is the second adaption of the 1925 novel of the same name by Liam O'Flaherty. It stars Victor McLaglen, Heather Angel, Preston Foster, Margot Grahame, Wallace Ford, Una O'Connor, Francis Ford and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. It was nominated for 6 Oscars and won 4 Academy Awards in 1936. ==Other websites== * Category:1935 drama movies Category:1930s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Ford Category:Movies set in Ireland Category:Movies about the Irish Republican Army
title: The Informer (movie)
